edge.logic

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • edge.logic.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Hibernate utility wrapper creates and handles all the hibernate stuff used in our application

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.hibernate.service.ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry 
      private static org.hibernate.SessionFactory sessionFactory 
      private static java.lang.ThreadLocal<org.hibernate.Session> threadLocal
      used to store active transactions

        private static org.hibernate.SessionFactory configureSessionFactory()
        Initialize hibernate using the hibernate.cfg.xml file
        Returns:
        Throws:

      • getSessionFactory

        public static org.hibernate.SessionFactory getSessionFactory()
        Access the current open session
        Returns:
        SessionFactory

      • getSession

        public static org.hibernate.Session getSession()
                                        throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        Function to access the session singleton. Returns the session Object of the current open session. if none session is open at the time it creates it.
        Returns:
        Session
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • rebuildSessionFactory

        private static void rebuildSessionFactory()
        Reconfigures the session factory.

      • closeSession

        public static void closeSession()
        closes the sessionFactory. No other database actions are possible after the session is closed.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        closes anonymous sessionFactory (alias of closeSession most of the time)

      • save

        public static boolean save(java.lang.Object hibernateObject)
        saves the hibernateObject to the database using the active session
        Parameters:
        hibernateObject - any edge.models Class object which should be saved to db
        Returns:

      • saveAndCommit

        public static void saveAndCommit(java.lang.Object hibernateObject)
        Saves/updates and commits the transaction. This instantely saves the object to the database
        Parameters:
        hibernateObject - any edge.models Class object which should be saved to db

      • dump

        public static void dump(BaseModel model)
        Dump the model to console for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        model - any edge model which offers the .dump method
